definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Epistle of St Jude (in New Testament)

sentences.english: And in Shushan the palace the Jews slew and destroyed five hundred men.
sentences.chinese: 在书珊城，犹大人杀灭了五百人。

sentences.english: And he answered me, These are the horns which have scattered Judah, Israel, and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他回答说，这是打散犹大，以色列，和耶路撒冷的角。

sentences.english: The people of Judah were taken captive to Babylon because of their unfaithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 犹大人因犯罪就被掳到巴比伦。

sentences.english: And Judah was carried away into exile to Babylon for their unfaithfulness .
sentences.chinese: 犹大人因犯罪就被掳到巴比伦。

sentences.english: And the king sent, and they gathered unto him all the elders of Judah and of Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 王差遣人招聚犹大和耶路撒冷的众长老来。

sentences.english: And he that offered his offering the first day was Nahshon the son of Amminadab, of the tribe of Judah
sentences.chinese: 头一日献供物的是犹大支派的亚米拿达的儿子拿顺。

sentences.english: He burned the bones of the priests on their altars, and so he purged Judah and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 将他们祭司的骸骨烧在坛上，洁净了犹大和耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: There is a sinister backdrop to traditional depictions of Judas.
sentences.chinese: 关于犹大的传统描述有着用心险恶的背景。

sentences.english: Tamar, Judah's daughter-in-law, bore him Perez and Zerah.
sentences.chinese: 犹大的儿妇他玛给犹大生法勒斯和谢拉。

sentences.english: Tamar, Judah's daughter-in-law, bore him Perez and Zerah.
sentences.chinese: 犹大的儿妇他玛给犹大生法勒斯和谢拉。

sentences.english: Now we have the Gospel of Judas.
sentences.chinese: 现在又加上了一部《犹大福音》。

sentences.english: But all Israel and Judah loved David, because he led them in their campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 但以色列和犹大众人都爱大卫，因为他领他们出入。

sentences.english: And as Judas was speaking these words, behold part of them appeared looking forth from the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 犹大还在说话时，发现有一部分敌人从山上窥望。

sentences.english: So Judas threw the money into the temple and left. Then he went away and hanged himself.
sentences.chinese: 犹大就把那银钱丢在殿里，出去吊死了。

sentences.english: The kingdom of Judah was succeeded by Judaea.
sentences.chinese: 犹大王国后由犹太继承。

sentences.english: Because of their guilt, God's anger came upon Judah and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 因他们这罪，就有忿怒临到犹大和耶路撒冷。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Jezebel, wife of Ahab and mother of Ahaziah, major character in 1 Kings 16:31, 19:1, 21 and 2 Kings 9, killed by Jehu 耶戶|耶户[Ye1 hu4]
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
Herod the Great (73 BC - 4 BC), Roman-appointed king of Judea (37-4 BC)
